analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/18/0x8c74878735c79c5fda55284ebcc5eac2030ba491.sol:
	Contract MIMTToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/18/0x8c74878735c79c5fda55284ebcc5eac2030ba491.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
